DOC.brief_summary: If patient unable foley catheter remove bladder empty well , may eligible study participation . This study design evaluate whether Posterior Tibial Nerve Stimulation effective improve bladdder function surgery . Study participation limit one day .
DOC.detailed_description: If patient fail void trial ( test do see foley catheter ready remove surgery ) , may offer participation trial . Patients randomize receive active treatment sham treatment . A small , accupuncture-type needle insert skin ankle . A small , battery-powered generator attach needle . The generator give low-voltabe stimulation adjust comfort level apply 30 minute . After treatemnt , void trial repeat .
DOC.criteria: First void trial Urogynecological surgery show bladder empty well . Patient decline participation .
